feed.title: Syncthing-Fork Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Syncthing-Fork: Syncthing-Fork v1.29.7.1
entry.content:
Checkpoint release - Use this if migrating from the deprecated "syncthing-android" to this app.

ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Problems upgrading from an older version than v1.29.7.1? ‚ÜóÔ∏è Please follow the steps: * Slide out the menu > Import and Export > Export config * Exit app * Uninstall app - if Android asks, do NOT keep data (this refers to app data, not your synced files) * (Re-)Install app using the latest release * Complete the welcome slides * Slide out the menu > Import and Export > Import config

If you still face problems, check out issue https://github.com/Catfriend1/syncthing-android/issues/4 .
